# Chocolate Chip Cheesecake

## Ingredients

* 1.5 cups (about 18) crushed Oreo cookies
* 0.25 cups melted margarine
* 3 (8 oz) pkg cream cheese
* 1 (14 oz) Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk
* 3 eggs
* 2 tsp vanilla extract
* 1 cup mini chocolate chips
* 1 tsp flour

## Instructions

Prehead the oven to 300&deg;F. Combine cookie crumbs and margarine and press firmly onto the bottom of a a 9" spring form cake pan. Beat cheese until fluffy. Ad milk, eggs, and vanilla extract and mix well. In a small bowl, toss 0.5 cups chocolate chips with flour to coat. Stir chips into the cheese mixture. Pour into a prepared pan, sprinkle remainingg chips evenly over the top and bake for 1 hr or until cake springs back when lightly touched. Coot to room temp, then chill.
